gui.display.dialogues

Class ResizeDialogue

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.display.dialogues.ResizeDialogue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ResizeDialogue
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Subclass of JPanel displayed when the resize image option is selected within EditImgPanel.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jacob Jones, Andrew Rottier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Mandatory method required in all classes that implement ActionListener.

      Accepts a double inches value and outputs a corresponding pixel value in int format.

      Accepts an int pixel value and outputs a corresponding inches value in double format.
      private void populateContainer()
      Adds widthContainer, heightContainer, aspectRatio, and applyButton to container.

      Adds heightLabel, heightPixelsField, heightPixelsLabel, heightInchesField, and heightInchesLabel to heightContainer.
      private void populateWidthContainer()
      Adds widthLabel, widthPixelsField, widthPixelsLabel, widthInchesField, and widthInchesLabel to widthContainer.
      void updateFields(java.awt.event.FocusEvent e)
      Upon one of the four text fields losing focus, the other text fields are updated, either to maintain aspect ratio or to keep the pixel/inch values in accordance with each other.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResizeDialogue

        public ResizeDialogue(FrameManager manager,
              EditImgPanel currentPanel,
              int originalWidth,
              int originalHeight)
        Populates this dialogue with all of the necessary graphical components.
        Parameters:
        manager - the instance of FrameManager that initialized this dialogue
        currentPanel - the instance of EditImgPanel associated with this class
        originalWidth - the original width of the image being resized, in pixels
        originalHeight - the original height of the image being resized, in pixels
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if originalWidth or originalHeight are negative

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Mandatory method required in all classes that implement ActionListener.

        Below is a list of possible source objects and their corresponding actions:

        • applyButton
          • Calls the resizeImg method within the current instance of EditImgPanel using the width and height values from this dialogue.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

      • updateFields

        public void updateFields(java.awt.event.FocusEvent e)
        Upon one of the four text fields losing focus, the other text fields are updated, either to maintain aspect ratio or to keep the pixel/inch values in accordance with each other.
        Parameters:
        e - the FocusEvent being processed

      • populateWidthContainer

        private void populateWidthContainer()
        Adds widthLabel, widthPixelsField, widthPixelsLabel, widthInchesField, and widthInchesLabel to widthContainer.

      • populateHeightContainer

        private void populateHeightContainer()
        Adds heightLabel, heightPixelsField, heightPixelsLabel, heightInchesField, and heightInchesLabel to heightContainer.

      • populateContainer

        private void populateContainer()
        Adds widthContainer, heightContainer, aspectRatio, and applyButton to container.
